name: Twilight Acolytes
description: These cultists are in majority former acolytes of the Kairc cults. But now they all server the only one - the Twilight Cult, which empowers them with the forces no one can imagine nor understand.

abilities.name: Chained Lightning
abilities.description: If the attack roll for a Dark Lightning is 6, another model nearby (friend or foe) is hit with the same attack (attack roll still required). This extra attack can provide another extra attack, but it cannot be chained to the firer or the models who are already in the chain.

abilities.name: Twilight Adept
abilities.description: This Acolyte's Dark Lightning have Damage of 2 rather than 1.

abilities.name: Acolyte with Shield
abilities.description: This Acolyte has a Vigour of 4 rather than 3.

abilities.name: Acolyte with Glaive
abilities.description: This Acolyte's Cursed Blade has a Damage of 2 rather than 1.

abilities.name: Acolyte with Two Blades
abilities.description: Roll 4 dice for this Acolyte's Cursed Blade rather than 2.

abilities.name: Scroll of Twilight Arts
abilities.description: Roll 2 dice for this Acolyte's Dark Lightning.

abilities.name: Shadowfiend
abilities.description: If an Acolyte with a Shadowfiend is on the board, subtract 1 from all rolls on their behaviour table (to a minimum of 1).

difficultyBonuses.description: Instead of +1 to Vigour, subtract -1 to all Behaviour Rolls made for Twilight Acolytes groups.

table.name: Draw Their Blood
table.description: Each but one Acolyte moves and then attacks with whichever weapon is in range. After all of these Acolytes have taken a turn, the idle one attacks with a Dark Lightning, repeating one additional time for each wound other Acolytes caused. It can target different heroes for these attacks.

table.name: Slay the Unbelievers
table.description: Each Acolyte attacks the nearest hero with whichever weapon is in range. Then, each Acolyte that did not attack moves towards the nearest hero.

table.name: There is No Escape
table.description: Each Acolyte moves towards the nearest hero. Then, each Acolyte attacks the nearest hero with whichever weapon is in range.

table.name: Fall Back
table.description: If there are twice as many heroes on the board as Acolytes, each Acolyte move towards the nearest portal. An Acolyte that ends its move on a portal flees and is removed from play. Each Acolyte still on the board then attacks the nearest hero with whichever weapon is in range.
